metadata.title: CVE-2019-8515 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A cross-origin issue existed with the fetch API. This was addressed withimproved input validation. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.2, tvOS 12.2,Safari 12.1, iTunes 12.9.4 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.11. Processingmaliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
